entry.title: Walker's Lovely Liquorice Toffee Bar - 50g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walker's Nonsuch Ltd
Type: Candy
Price: 1.49

Old Fashioned British Candy

Walker's Famous Licorice Toffees Candy

Fun Fact! - Some people believe that Walker's liqourice toffee actually has medicinal properties. You might want to try it for yourself!

Made with only the finest ingredients, Walker's toffee is made with careful consideration and care every step of the way. This creamy bar of traditional liquorice is sure to make you fall head over heels. Just whack and then unwrap, this premium toffee may become your next staple treat!

Made in Stoke-on-Trent, England for generations

Message from the Grandchildren of the Founder of Walkers¬†

"From a tiny sweet shop in Longton, Stoke-on-Trent during the 19th Century, our great grandfather Edward Joseph began making toffee for a handful of local customers.¬†Using only the finest ingredients he created a unique recipe which is still used today.¬†Toffee prepared to this recipe has made Walker's a favourite for over a hundred years. We consider it to be the best and hope you agree."
Katie, Emma, and Ed
Great Grandchildren of Edward Joseph Walker

  • Loved by the Queen of England
  • Suitable for vegetarians
  • Contains Milk
  • May contain nut traces
  • Gluten-free ~ EU
  • Gelatine free

Freshest Candy Shipped Fast across Canada and the USA!

entry.title: Stockley's Sugar Free Blackcurrant & Liquorice - 70g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stockley's
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Sugar-Free but Full of Sweetness

Indulge guilt-free in¬†Stockley's Sugar Free Blackcurrant & Liquorice candies! First you get the crunchy outside then you get the chewy centre. Each candy has a blackcurrant flavour hard boiled¬†shell with a sugar free chewy liquorice toffee centre. They taste just as great as the sweets you remember from your childhood, but now sugar free!¬†Made with sweeteners.¬†So irresistible you'll be snacking all day!¬†

In 1918, Malcolm Stockley returned home from the first world war to his native town of Accrington, Lancashire, to recommence the craft that he had pursued as a youngerman, that being the art of toffee making. It was from these humble beginnings, in a shed in the High Street, that the Stockley's name first became recognized as quality sweet manufacturers. Stockley's is, in fact, a living tribute to a golden age of sweet making and is guaranteed to re-kindle fond memories. The tradition, quality and love that is place into our recipes has made Stockley's one of the most recognized sweet manufacturers in Great Britain.

  • British¬†Candy
  • Gluten-Free
  • Sugar Free

70g
